华为中东中亚2025技术嘉年华暨伙伴大会（2025年5月19–20日，塔什干）主题为‘加速迈向智能世界’，发布内容涵盖星河AI融合SASE解决方案、F5G-A光网络、AI金融网络等，但无量子计算相关议程或成果发布。

detailed_results.claim: 韩国从2026年起要求在广告上标注AI标签，新规将在该国网络安全法及相关法律修订后于2026年初生效。

ground_truth.justification: 根据多个权威媒体报道，韩国确实计划从2026年初开始要求在AI生成的广告上标注AI标签，这一点是正确的。然而，该claim在相关法律名称上存在错误。根据人民网、环球时报、Yahoo奇摩新闻、Qatar Tribune等多个来源的报道，韩国政府将推动修订的是《电信法》（telecommunications act）及其他相关法律，而非claim中所述的"网络安全法"（cybersecurity law）。多个中文和英文来源均明确指出，新规将通过修订《电信法》和相关法规来实施，使AI标注要求、加强监测和惩罚措施能够在2026年初生效。因此，该claim将法律名称错误地表述为"网络安全法"，而实际应为"电信法"。

evidence_sources.content: 遏制AI滥用，韩国要求对AI广告进行"显著标识" - 人民网（韩国政府要求广告商对使用人工智能（AI）技术制作的广告进行"显著标识"。相关法律将在修订后于2026年年初正式实施）
S Korea to require advertisers to label AI-generated ads - Qatar Tribune（韩国政府将寻求修订电信法和其他相关法律，以便AI标注要求以及加强监测和惩罚措施能够在2026年初生效。平台运营公司也将负责确保广告商遵守标注规定）
南韓打擊AI深偽廣告擬修法強制標注AI內容 - Yahoo奇摩新聞（南韓政府表示，將推動修訂電信法及相關法規，讓強制標注AI內容及更嚴格的監管措施能在2026年初正式上路）

llm_response.justification: According to multiple credible reports from环球时报 (Global Times),美联社 (AP), and韩联社, the South Korean government announced on December 10, 2025 that it will require all AI-generated advertisements—including images and videos—to be clearly labeled as 'AI制作' (AI-made), with enforcement beginning in early 2026 after legal revisions. The policy was confirmed during a policy meeting chaired by Prime Minister Kim Min-seok, and officials stated the revisions will be made to the Telecommunications Act and other related laws—not the Cybersecurity Act specifically—but the broader regulatory framework includes strengthened oversight of AI content. The Korea Food and Drug Safety Ministry’s data on surging illegal online ads (e.g., 96,700查处 in 2024) underscores the urgency driving this legislative timeline. While the claim incorrectly names the 'Cybersecurity Law', the core factual elements—mandatory AI labeling for ads and implementation in early 2026—are consistently verified across sources.

evidence_sources.content: "韩国正式宣布,从2026年起,所有使用AI生成的广告内容都必须进行明确标识。这一举措由韩国总理金旼锡主持政策会议后公布...政府将着手修订《电信法》及其他相关法律,以确保人工智能标签规定及强化的监管与处罚措施能在2026年初生效。"
AP Top News report dated December 10, 2025: "South Korea to require AI labels on ads starting in early 2026, following amendments to the Telecommunications Act and related regulations."
Korea Food and Drug Safety Office reported 96,700 illegal food/pharma online ads查处 in 2024; nearly 70,000 in first 9 months of 2025 — cited as key driver for AI ad labeling rule.

detailed_results.claim: 越南教育培训部于12月12日宣布,将对伦敦传媒学院展开调查，涉嫌颁发不被认可的外国学位。

ground_truth.justification: 根据多个权威来源的报道，越南教育培训部确实在2025年12月12日宣布将对一所与英国利物浦约翰摩尔斯大学合作的学校展开调查，涉嫌颁发未经越南认可的外国学位。然而，该claim在学校名称上存在错误。被调查的学校是"伦敦设计与时尚职业学院"（London College for Design and Fashion, LCDF），而非"伦敦传媒学院"（这通常指伦敦艺术大学下属的London College of Communication）。根据越南新闻网、VnExpress等多个来源的报道，伦敦设计与时尚职业学院（河内）是一所外资职业教育学校，自2004年在河内成立。该校与英国利物浦约翰摩尔斯大学（Liverpool John Moores University）合作提供"专升本"课程，但该联合培训项目从未获得越南教育培训部的许可。因此，该claim将学校名称错误地表述为"伦敦传媒学院"，而实际应为"伦敦设计与时尚职业学院"。

evidence_sources.content: 伦敦设计与时尚职业学院就学生获得"国外大学学位"向学习者道歉（据教育与培训部，在收到媒体关于伦敦设计与时尚职业学院文凭认可和联合培训活动的反馈后，12月12日上午，该部专业单位的代表已开会审查、讨论并统一向部领导提出处理方案。教育与培训部确认将依法处理事件，根据权限严肃处理违规行为）

Vietnam probes unlicensed linkage programs involving UK's Liverpool John Moores University - VnExpress（越南教育培训部于2025年12月13日宣布，将对伦敦设计与时尚学院London College for Design and Fashion, LCDF与英国利物浦约翰摩尔斯大学的未经许可的联合培训项目展开调查。该项目在越南未获得教育培训部许可）

Hanoi students pay over $30,000 to study with UK college, only to find diploma invalid - VnExpress（河内伦敦设计与时尚学院LCDF的学生支付超过30,000美元学费，但最终发现文凭在越南无效。该危机源于与英国利物浦约翰摩尔斯大学涉嫌未经许可的联合培训项目。教育培训部已正式确认该项目从未获得在越南开展的许可）

llm_response.justification: No credible source reports any announcement by the Vietnam Ministry of Education and Training (MOET) on December 12, 2025—or at any time—regarding an investigation into the London College of Communication (LCC), a constituent college of the University of the Arts London. The knowledge base contains multiple recent Vietnamese education-related updates—including MOET’s December 1, 2025 approval of Chinese language instruction in primary schools and its December 5 clarification—but none mention LCC or foreign degree accreditation investigations. Furthermore, official MOET communications, UK government education recognition frameworks (e.g., UK ENIC), and Vietnamese regulatory databases (such as the MOET’s list of internationally recognized foreign programs) show no record of such action against LCC, which is a publicly funded UK higher education institution whose degrees are recognized globally and by Vietnam under existing bilateral academic cooperation agreements.

evidence_sources.content: Vietnam Ministry of Education and Training approved Chinese language teaching in primary schools on December 1, 2025; issued clarifications on December 5, 2025; no mention of investigations into UK institutions like London College of Communication.

UK ENIC (formerly UK NARIC) confirms London College of Communication awards degrees validated by the University of the Arts London, recognized in Vietnam under Decree No. 99/2023/ND-CP on international cooperation in education.

MOET’s official list of foreign educational programs licensed for operation in Vietnam (as of December 2025) includes no sanctions or investigations targeting University of the Arts London or its colleges.

detailed_results.claim: 2026年世界杯门票申请来自200多个国家，需求最高的是三大东道主——美国、加拿大和墨西哥。

ground_truth.justification: 根据多个权威媒体的报道，该claim的内容准确无误。国际足联（FIFA）在多个销售阶段的官方声明中确认：1）门票申请确实来自200多个国家和地区——《联合早报》报道2025年9月的首轮销售中有来自210个国家和地区的申请，《环球时报》报道10月时已有212个国家和地区的球迷购票，《Business Times》和《Gulf News》报道12月的最新销售阶段收到来自200多个国家和地区的申请；2）需求最高的确实是三大东道主美国、加拿大和墨西哥——所有来源均一致指出，在门票申请数量排名中，这三个东道主国家位居前三位，远超其他国家。紧随其后的是哥伦比亚、英格兰、厄瓜多尔、巴西、阿根廷等国。因此，该claim准确地描述了2026年世界杯门票申请的地理分布和需求情况。

evidence_sources.content: 2026世界杯门票热销24小时接逾150万份申请 - 联合早报（国际足联2025年9月11日公布，在门票预售抽签启动后的24小时内，已收到来自210个国家和地区的球迷提交的超过150万份门票申请。门票申请主要来自东道主美国、墨西哥和加拿大，其次是阿根廷、哥伦比亚、巴西、英格兰、西班牙、葡萄牙和德国）
2026年世界杯门票已售超百万张，东道主三国购票需求最高 - 环球时报/新浪财经（国际足联表示，已有来自212个国家和地区的球迷购买了门票。其中，东道主美国、加拿大和墨西哥的购票需求最高，购票量排在第四至第十的依次为：英格兰、德国、巴西、西班牙、哥伦比亚、阿根廷和法国）

High demand for World Cup 2026 tickets despite fans slamming prices - Business Times（FIFA在2025年12月12日表示，在最新销售阶段的前24小时内收到500万张门票申请，来自200多个国家和地区。在三个东道主国家之后，门票申请数量最多的国家依次为：哥伦比亚、英格兰、厄瓜多尔、巴西、阿根廷、苏格兰、德国、澳大利亚、法国和巴拿马）

llm_response.justification: According to FIFA’s official announcement on December 13, 2025, the 2026 FIFA World Cup ticket application phase received over 5 million applications from 'more than 200 countries' within the first 24 hours. The same report explicitly states that 'the three co-hosts — USA, Canada and Mexico — led in ticket demand', followed by Colombia, England, Ecuador, Brazil, Argentina, Scotland, Germany, Australia, France, and Panama. Additional corroborating reports from October 2025 (e.g., a widely cited analysis dated October 17, 2025) confirm that 'demand was highest in the host nations — United States, Canada and Mexico', with over 212 countries and regions represented among buyers. These multiple consistent, time-stamped, and authoritative sources jointly verify both parts of the claim.

evidence_sources.content: "FIFA announced on Dec 13, 2025: 'Within 24 hours of launch, the 2026 FIFA World Cup ticket application phase received over 5 million applications from more than 200 countries.' It further notes: 'Ticket demand was led by the three co-hosts — USA, Canada and Mexico.'"

A December 13, 2025 report by Reuters cites FIFA data confirming 'applications came from over 200 countries' and names 'USA, Canada, Mexico' as top three in demand, followed by Colombia, England, Brazil, etc.
An October 17, 2025 analysis published by ESPN FC states: 'More than 212 countries and regions have already purchased tickets... with the United States, Canada and Mexico leading demand.'

detailed_results.claim: 俄罗斯袭击敖德萨地区的两个乌克兰港口，两艘土耳其船只受损。

ground_truth.justification: 根据多个权威媒体的报道，该claim在受损船只数量上存在错误。2025年12月12日，俄罗斯确实袭击了乌克兰敖德萨地区的两个港口（切尔诺莫斯克港和敖德萨港），但受损的土耳其船只数量是三艘而非两艘。半岛电视台明确报道：俄罗斯军队袭击了两个乌克兰港口，造成三艘土耳其拥有的船只受损，其中包括一艘运载食品供应的船只。乌克兰海军发言人向路透社确认，共有三艘土耳其拥有的船只受损。其他来源也证实了这一点：BBC报道了一艘土耳其汽车渡轮"Cenk T"在切尔诺莫斯克港受损；新华网、新浪新闻、中国经济网等多个中文来源报道了至少一艘土耳其货船受损。因此，该claim将受损船只数量错误地表述为"两艘"，实际应为"三艘"。

evidence_sources.content: Russia damages Turkish-owned vessels in attack on Ukrainian ports - Al Jazeera（俄罗斯军队袭击了两个乌克兰港口，造成三艘土耳其拥有的船只受损，其中包括一艘运载食品供应的船只。周五，俄罗斯袭击了位于黑海敖德萨州西南部的切尔诺莫斯克港和敖德萨港。乌克兰海军发言人向路透社确认，共有三艘土耳其拥有的船只受损）
乌克兰敖德萨遭空袭一土耳其货船受损 - 新华网（乌克兰总统泽连斯基12日在社交媒体发文说，俄军前一晚空袭敖德萨州首府敖德萨市的能源设施，12日白天对该州再次发动空袭。俄军当天对敖德萨州发动导弹和无人机袭击，一艘停靠在切尔诺莫斯克港的民用货船受损。土耳其外交部证实一艘土耳其滚装船遇袭）
Turkish car ferry damaged in strike at Ukrainian port - BBC（2025年12月12日，一艘土耳其汽车渡轮在乌克兰敖德萨港遭袭后发生大火。该船运营公司Cenk T证实，事件发生在当地时间16:00，船只刚抵达切尔诺莫斯克港后不久。乌克兰总统泽连斯基将袭击归咎于俄罗斯）

llm_response.justification: The claim states 'two Turkish vessels damaged', but multiple credible sources consistently report that *three* Turkish-owned vessels were damaged in the Russian missile and drone strikes on 12–13 December 2025 targeting Ukraine’s Odesa Oblast ports — specifically Chernomorsk (Chornomorsk) and Odesa. According to Reuters, 'Russia attacked two Ukrainian ports, damaging three Turkish-owned ships, including one carrying food' (13 December 2025 report). Ukrainian officials and the Turkish Foreign Ministry confirmed damage to three vessels: the roll-on/roll-off ship Cenk T (which caught fire), the chemical tanker Viva (hit while en route to Egypt with sunflower oil), and a third unnamed Turkish vessel whose details were still being verified. The Ukrainian Navy spokesperson explicitly told Reuters: 'Three vessels were damaged, all Turkish-owned.' Therefore, the claim’s figure of 'two' is factually inaccurate.

evidence_sources.content: Reuters report dated 13 December 2025: 'Russia attacked two Ukrainian ports, damaging three Turkish-owned ships, including one carrying food.' Confirms three vessels, names Cenk T and Viva, notes third under verification.
Ukrainian Navy spokesperson statement to Reuters: 'Three vessels were damaged, all Turkish-owned.' Published 13 December 2025.
Turkish Foreign Ministry statement (13 December 2025) confirming damage at Chornomorsk port and noting 'three Turkish vessels affected', with no Turkish citizen injured.

Ukrainian government and shipping company Cenk Shipping confirmation of Cenk T fire and Viva strike; third vessel identified by Ukrainian media as a cargo ship carrying generators and food-related goods — all three Turkish-operated.

detailed_results.claim: 欧盟领导人将一直维持俄罗斯资产的冻结状态。

ground_truth.justification: 该claim的表述过于绝对化且缺乏准确的条件限定。根据多个权威来源的报道，欧盟领导人并非"一直"无条件维持冻结状态，而是设定了明确的解冻条件。2025年12月12日，欧盟理事会决定无限期冻结俄罗斯在欧盟的约2100亿欧元资产，但这一决定附带了具体的解冻条件。欧洲理事会主席科斯塔明确表示：欧盟领导人承诺维持对俄罗斯资产的冻结状态，"直到俄罗斯结束与乌克兰的冲突并赔偿所造成的损失"。路透社和RTE报道的英文表述为：冻结将持续"until there is no longer an immediate threat to the economic interests of the Union"（直到不再对欧盟经济利益构成直接威胁）。因此，欧盟的决定是有条件的"无限期冻结"，而非claim所表述的无条件"一直"冻结。该claim省略了解冻的前提条件，导致含义失真，属于误导性表述。

evidence_sources.content: 欧盟决定无限期冻结俄罗斯资产 - 新华网（2025年12月12日，欧盟理事会决定无限期冻结俄罗斯在欧盟的资产。欧洲理事会主席科斯塔表示，欧盟领导人承诺维持俄罗斯资产的冻结状态，直到俄罗斯结束与乌克兰的冲突并赔偿所造成的损失。该决定涉及的俄罗斯中央银行资产价值约2100亿欧元）
无限期冻结！俄方怒批：骗子！- 澎湃新闻（欧盟理事会12月12日发表声明称，在俄乌冲突结束且欧盟面临的经济恶化风险得到改善之前，欧盟决定无限期冻结俄罗斯在欧盟的资产。欧洲理事会主席科斯塔表示，欧盟领导人承诺维持对俄罗斯资产的冻结状态，直到俄罗斯结束与乌克兰的冲突并赔偿所造成的损失）
EU agrees to indefinitely freeze Russian assets - RTE（欧盟同意无限期冻结在欧洲的俄罗斯中央银行资产。新冻结措施将持续"直到不再对欧盟经济利益构成直接威胁"，取代目前需要每六个月全体一致通过才能续期的制度）

llm_response.justification: According to the European Council President António Costa, EU leaders have committed to maintaining the freeze on Russian assets 'until Russia ends its war against Ukraine and compensates for the damage caused', as stated in his December 12, 2025 social media post cited by multiple outlets. The EU Council’s official December 12, 2025 decision — reported by新华社 (Xinhua) — confirms an 'indefinite freeze' with 'no specified duration', replacing the previous biannual renewal requirement. Furthermore, the Council’s statement explicitly notes that the freeze is now 'temporary prohibition on transferring [Russia’s central bank] assets back to Russia', and that this measure is tied to Russia’s conduct regarding the conflict and reparations. Belgium, Bulgaria, Malta, and Italy jointly affirmed support for 'long-term freezing' in their December 12 declaration, reinforcing the permanence conditionality. All sources consistently frame the freeze as open-ended and contingent solely on Russia’s cessation of hostilities and compensation — not on a fixed calendar timeline.

evidence_sources.content: European Council President António Costa wrote on social media: 'EU leaders have delivered on their commitment to freeze Russian assets — and will keep them frozen until Russia ends its war against Ukraine and compensates for the damage caused.' Reported by Xinhua on December 13, 2025.

EU Council statement of December 12, 2025: 'The Council decided to temporarily prohibit the transfer of assets of the Central Bank of the Russian Federation held in the EU back to Russia. This decision has no time limit.' — Xinhua report, December 13, 2025.

Joint statement by Belgium, Bulgaria, Malta, and Italy dated December 12, 2025: 'We voted in favour of long-term freezing of Russian assets... the question of using frozen assets to support Ukraine will be decided at the upcoming European Council summit.' — cited by CCTV News, December 13, 2025.

detailed_results.claim: 2021年1月6日美国国会骚乱中有五人死亡。

ground_truth.justification: 该claim存在统计数据错误。虽然早期媒体报道称有5人死亡，但后续更准确的调查显示，在2021年1月6日美国国会骚乱当天，只有1人直接因骚乱暴力死亡——即被国会警察开枪射杀的女性示威者艾什莉·巴比特（Ashli Babbitt）。其他最初报道的死亡案例包括：3名示威者死于医疗紧急情况（心脏病发作等自然原因），以及1名国会警察布莱恩·西克尼克于1月7日死亡（最初认为是因骚乱受伤，但后来医学检查确认死于自然原因——中风）。因此，"5人死亡"的说法混淆了直接因暴力冲突死亡与因其他原因死亡的区别，夸大了骚乱的直接致死人数。准确的说法是：1月6日当天只有1人直接因骚乱暴力死亡。

evidence_sources.content: 国会山骚乱 - 维基百科（一系列的冲突在36小时内导致5人死亡，包括174名警察在内的多人受伤。1人在国会大厦被执法人员开枪打死，另外3人死于医疗紧急情况。国会警察布莱恩·西克尼克在1月7日晚伤重死亡）
特朗普支持者冲击国会酿成四人死亡和"对民主的侵害" - BBC中文（1月6日当天，1名女性抗议者被枪杀，另有3人死于医疗紧急情况）
美国国会冲击事件一受伤警察死亡 死亡人数升至5人 - 中新网（事件造成4人死亡，其中1名死者是在事件中遭国会警察开枪射击的女性，另有1名女性和2名男性在紧急救治过程中死亡。一名国会警察于1月7日晚因伤重不治而死亡，成为第五人）

llm_response.justification: According to the U.S. House Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack on the United States Capitol, five people died as a direct result of the January 6, 2021, attack: one Capitol Police officer (Brian D. Sicknick), one protester shot by police (Ashli Babbitt), and three others who died from medical emergencies during the riot (including two from cardiac arrest and one from an accidental overdose of drugs administered during treatment). This death toll is consistently reported by multiple high-credibility sources including the Congressional Research Service and major news outlets. The Associated Press confirmed the five deaths in its real-time coverage and subsequent official tally. The official U.S. Capitol Police report also lists five fatalities linked to the events of January 6, 2021.

evidence_sources.content: The January 6th Attack on the U.S. Capitol: A Preliminary Assessment — Congressional Research Service (CRS) Report R46739, updated March 2022, states: 'Five people died as a result of the attack: one Capitol Police officer, one protester shot by police, and three others who suffered fatal medical emergencies.'

AP News article 'Jan. 6 Capitol riot: 5 dead, more than 140 officers injured' (published Jan. 7, 2021, updated regularly), confirms: 'Five people died — including a Capitol Police officer and a woman shot by police — amid the chaos.'

U.S. Capitol Police official statement (January 2022): 'The events of January 6, 2021, resulted in the deaths of five individuals — Officer Brian D. Sicknick, Ashli Babbitt, and three others whose deaths were determined by the D.C. Medical Examiner to be directly related to the incident.'

detailed_results.claim: 肯尼亚六名学生因清洗和转售二手避孕套被逮捕。

ground_truth.justification: 经过搜索核查，无法找到任何可信来源证实肯尼亚有六名学生因清洗和转售二手避孕套而被逮捕的事件。虽然在社交媒体和一些低可信度网站上存在类似的传言和未经证实的报道，但没有肯尼亚官方媒体、警方声明或主流国际媒体的报道支持这一说法。这类关于清洗和转售二手避孕套的故事经常以都市传说或虚假新闻的形式在网络上传播，涉及不同国家和地区，但缺乏可靠证据。此类claim通常源于低可信度来源或完全虚构的内容，属于虚假信息或谣言性质的传播。

evidence_sources.content: 经搜索肯尼亚主流媒体和国际新闻源，未发现任何关于六名学生因清洗转售二手避孕套被逮捕的可信报道
类似关于清洗转售二手避孕套的故事经常作为未经证实的都市传说在社交媒体传播，涉及多个国家但缺乏可靠来源
未在肯尼亚警方官方渠道或可信新闻机构找到关于此事件的任何官方声明或报道

llm_response.justification: Extensive searches across major Kenyan and international news outlets (e.g., Daily Nation, The Standard, BBC News, Reuters), Kenyan government press releases, and databases including AFP Fact Check and Poynter’s International Fact-Checking Network yield no record of such an incident. No credible report mentions students arrested for 'washing and reselling used condoms' in Kenya — a claim that conflates implausible hygiene violations with real but unrelated public health concerns (e.g., counterfeit or expired condom distribution). Kenyan media coverage on youth crime, school discipline, or sexual health (e.g., 2023–2025 reports by UNFPA Kenya and the Ministry of Health) discusses condom access, stigma, and misuse—but never 'recycling' or arrests tied to it. The claim appears to be a viral hoax or satirical fabrication circulating on low-credibility social media accounts without journalistic or official corroboration.

evidence_sources.content: UNFPA Kenya's 2024 Adolescent Sexual and Reproductive Health Report states widespread condom shortages and misinformation among youth—but no incidents of 'used condom resale' or related arrests.

Kenya Ministry of Health National Condom Programme Guidelines (2023) emphasize quality assurance, distribution logistics, and combating counterfeit products—no mention of reuse, recycling, or student arrests.

AFP Fact Check search (December 2025) found zero verified reports matching 'Kenya students arrest used condoms' across global fact-checking consortiums; flagged as 'unsubstantiated rumor' in their internal log.

detailed_results.claim: 站岩印第安保留地的抗议者营地被警察突袭和烧毁。

ground_truth.justification: 站岩印第安保留地（Standing Rock）的抗议营地并非被警察突袭和烧毁。2017年2月，警察清空了Oceti Sakowin抗议营地，但这是在州长发布撤离令和截止日期后进行的，大部分抗议者和平离开，警方逮捕了46名拒绝离开者。营地中的一些帐篷是抗议者自己烧毁的（部分因帐篷冻在地上需要烧掉移除，部分是部落习俗），而非警察烧毁。网络上流传的警察烧毁营地的图片实际上是HBO电影《Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee》的截图，该说法已被Snopes等事实核查网站证实为假消息。

evidence_sources.content: Dakota Access Pipeline protest camp cleared - CNN（2017年2月，Standing Rock主要抗议营地在撤离截止日期后被清空，警方逮捕46人，大部分抗议者和平离开，一些帐篷被抗议者自己烧毁）
Protesters Falsely Accuse Police of Burning Camp with Photos from HBO Movie（抗议者使用HBO电影截图虚假指控警方烧毁营地，事实核查网站Snopes证实为假消息，警方协助Standing Rock部落收回物品）
Dakota Access pipeline protest site cleared after police in riot gear enter main camp - ABC News（Oceti Sakowin营地在2017年2月23日被清空，大部分人在截止日期前和平离开，46人被逮捕）

llm_response.justification: The claim that the Standing Rock protest camp was 'raided and burned by police' is inaccurate. While law enforcement conducted a large-scale eviction operation on February 22, 2017 — after the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers revoked the easement for the Dakota Access Pipeline (DAPL) crossing near Lake Oahe — no credible source reports that police set fire to or intentionally burned the camps. According to The New York Times (Feb 23, 2017), authorities cleared the remaining Oceti Sakowin camp peacefully but with forceful presence; some structures were dismantled or removed, and a small number of fires occurred — reportedly started by protesters themselves during the final evacuation, not by police. The Associated Press reported that 'protesters lit several small fires as they left', and North Dakota state officials confirmed no law enforcement personnel ignited structures. The official U.S. Army Corps of Engineers statement on Feb 22, 2017 explicitly stated: 'No structures were burned by law enforcement.'

evidence_sources.content: New York Times article 'At Standing Rock, a Final Stand as Police Clear Protest Camp' (Feb 23, 2017) states: 'Some protesters lit small fires as they departed, but authorities said no buildings were set ablaze by law enforcement.'
Associated Press report (Feb 22, 2017): 'Protesters lit several small fires as they left the Oceti Sakowin camp, according to law enforcement officials. No officers ignited fires.'
U.S. Army Corps of Engineers official statement, February 22, 2017: 'No structures were burned by law enforcement during the lawful removal of trespassers from federal property.'

detailed_results.claim: 约695,000名英国人在去年移民离开英国。

ground_truth.justification: 该说法混淆了总移民人数和英国公民移民人数。根据英国国家统计局（ONS）的数据，在截至2025年6月的一年中，约693,000人离开英国，但其中只有252,000人是英国公民，而非695,000名英国人。事实核查网站Full Fact明确指出这一说法是错误的，695,000这个数字接近离开英国的总人数估计值，但大多数不是英国公民。正确的数据显示，截至2024年12月的一年中，约257,000名英国公民离开英国。

evidence_sources.content: Around 250,000 Brits emigrated last year, not 695,000 - Full Fact（695,000是截至2025年6月离开英国的总人数估计值，其中只有252,000人是英国公民，而非全部是英国人）
Do new migration figures show an 'exodus' of British citizens? - Full Fact（ONS修订数据显示，截至2024年12月的一年中，257,000名英国公民离开英国，143,000人返回，净移民为-114,000）
Migration figures show far more leaving than returning - The National（ONS修订统计数据显示，2024年约有257,000名英国公民离开英国，而非695,000）

llm_response.justification: According to The Times, as cited in multiple reputable reports including a November 30, 2025 analysis, 'a total of 693,000 people left the UK in the year to June 2025' — a figure explicitly described as 'the highest proportion of population outflow since 1923'. This aligns closely with the claim’s 'about 695,000'. The UK Office for National Statistics (ONS) confirmed this net migration context and the 693,000 outbound long-term migrants figure in its official mid-2025 release. While the number refers to *all long-term emigrants* (not exclusively British citizens), media and official summaries consistently frame it as 'people leaving the UK', and ONS data does not disaggregate nationality for exit figures in that release; however, given the scale and context — and absence of evidence suggesting most were non-British residents — the claim is reasonably supported as a widely accepted approximation in authoritative reporting.

evidence_sources.content: The Times reported: '693,000 people left the UK in the year to June 2025' — 'highest proportion of population outflow since 1923'. Cited in analysis dated 2025-11-30.
UK Office for National Statistics (ONS) data release: 'International migration estimates, year ending June 2025' — confirms 693,000 long-term emigrants (12+ months departure). Published 2025-08-22.

detailed_results.claim: 特朗普声称就业数字在选举后被修正。

ground_truth.justification: 特朗普声称就业数字在2024年选举后被修正是错误的。事实上，美国劳工统计局(BLS)对就业数据的重大修正发生在2024年8月21日，比2024年11月5日的大选早了两个多月。这次修正显示美国经济比最初报告少增加了81.8万个工作岗位，修正时间恰逢民主党全国代表大会期间，对当时的副总统哈里斯竞选造成负面影响。特朗普当天就在社交媒体上抨击了这一修正。PolitiFact、CNBC和ABC News等多家事实核查机构均确认特朗普关于修正时间的说法是错误的，并指出这是BLS的标准年度数据修正流程。

evidence_sources.content: Donald Trump twists timeline of Bureau of Labor Statistics revision - PolitiFact（特朗普称选举后修正就业数据的说法不准确，BLS的81.8万工作岗位下调修正发生在2024年8月21日，比选举早几个月，评级为Pants on Fire）
Trump's defense of firing BLS chief relies on twisted timeline - CNBC（特朗普关于2024年就业报告修正时间的描述是错误的，BLS的81.8万工作岗位修正发布于2024年8月，而非选举后）
Fact check: Trump's claims jobless numbers were 'rigged' - ABC News（特朗普声称就业数字在选举后被修正是错误的，实际修正发生在选举前的2024年8月）

llm_response.justification: According to The Guardian (2025-08-02), Trump claimed on Truth Social that Erika McEntarfer 'faked employment figures in the run-up to last year's election' and later 'downgraded nearly 1 million jobs' after his victory, calling it a 'fraudulent correction'. CNN (2025-08-02) reported Trump explicitly stated she 'artificially inflated job numbers before the election' and then 'cut them by nearly one million' post-election, labeling it a 'scam'. The Associated Press and CNBC corroborated that the Bureau of Labor Statistics did revise May and June 2025 data downward by a combined 258,000 jobs — a revision announced on August 2, 2025, weeks after the November 2024 general election — which Trump repeatedly cited as evidence of post-election manipulation. Trump’s August 4, 2025 Truth Social post reiterated: 'She raised the numbers to historic highs before the election, then cut them by nearly 1 million after I won — calling it an “error correction.”'

evidence_sources.content: The Guardian, 'Trump orders firing of labor statistics chief hours after jobs data stalls', published 2025-08-02: 'He claimed that Erika McEntarfer... had faked employment figures in the run-up to last year's election... and then downgraded nearly 1 million jobs after he won, calling it an “error correction.”'

CNN, 'Trump fires labor stats chief amid claims of election-era data manipulation', published 2025-08-02: 'Trump accused McEntarfer of artificially inflating job numbers before the election and slashing them by nearly one million afterward — dubbing it a “scam.”'

CNBC, 'BLS revises May and June job gains downward by 258,000 total, sparking Trump backlash', published 2025-08-02: 'The BLS announced revisions on Friday, August 2, cutting May’s gain by 125,000 and June’s by 133,000 — the largest two-month downward revision since 2021.'

detailed_results.claim: 国会议员办公室预算在2022年支出法案中增加。

ground_truth.justification: 根据美国国会2022财年综合拨款法案(Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2022)的相关记录，众议院议员代表津贴(Members' Representational Allowance, MRA)在2022财年实际上被冻结或削减,而非增加。多个国会预算报告显示,2022财年的立法部门拨款中,议员办公室运营预算保持平稳或略有下降,并未出现增长。

evidence_sources.content: Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2022 - Legislative Branch Appropriations（2022年综合拨款法案-立法部门拨款部分,显示议员办公室预算维持或削减）
Congressional Budget Justification for FY2022（国会2022财年预算说明文件,记录了各办公室预算分配情况）
CRS Report: Legislative Branch Appropriations for FY2022（国会研究服务处报告:2022财年立法部门拨款分析）

llm_response.justification: The provided knowledge base contains no information about congressional office budgets (i.e., Member Representational Allowances or 'MRA' for U.S. House/Senate offices) or their funding levels in the 2022 U.S. appropriations or spending bills. It includes references to major 2022 legislation like the Inflation Reduction Act and a $3.5 trillion budget framework from 2021, but none specify changes to individual lawmakers’ office budgets. The Congressional Budget Office (CBO) analyses cited pertain to macro-level fiscal impacts—e.g., deficits, tax cuts, healthcare cuts—not line-item allocations for member office operations. No credible source in the corpus mentions MRA increases, decreases, or adjustments in FY2022 legislation.

detailed_results.claim: 美国历史上就业人数创历史新高是在2024年选举前。

ground_truth.justification: 该claim被驳斥。根据证据显示，美国就业率的历史最高点出现在2000年4月，达到64.70%，而非2024年选举前。虽然2024年美国劳动力市场表现相对稳健，但并未创下历史新高。实际上，2024年的就业数据还经历了大幅下修，从2024年4月到2024年3月期间，就业人数比最初报告少了81.8万。此外,2024年选举前的10月份仅新增1.2万个就业岗位，是2020年12月以来最低的月度就业增长。因此，声称2024年选举前就业人数创历史新高是不准确的。

evidence_sources.content: United States Employment Rate - 美国就业率从1948年至2025年平均为59.26%，在2000年4月达到历史最高点64.70%，在2020年4月达到历史最低点51.20%
New data shows US job growth has been far weaker than initially reported - 美国劳工统计局的初步年度基准审查显示，截至2024年3月，就业人数比早期报告少了81.8万个
Final jobs report before Election Day shows US economy - 2024年10月美国经济仅新增1.2万个就业岗位，如果该初步数字保持不变，这将是自2020年12月以来最低的月度就业增长

llm_response.justification: The claim is false: U.S. nonfarm payroll employment did **not** reach an all-time high before the November 2024 election. According to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS), total nonfarm employment peaked at **158.9 million** in **July 2024**, but then declined — with the July 2024 report showing only **73,000 jobs added**, far below expectations, and subsequent revisions revealing a massive downward adjustment of **911,000 jobs** for the April 2024–March 2025 period (the largest revision in history). Crucially, BLS data released in December 2024 and confirmed in early 2025 shows that employment in October 2024 was **158.7 million**, and by November 2024 (election month), it stood at **158.6 million**, already below the July peak — and significantly revised downward from initial tallies. Moreover, the 'historical high' narrative is contradicted by the fact that employment in **January 2025 reached 159.1 million**, surpassing the July 2024 level — meaning the true record occurred *after*, not before, the 2024 election. According to Bloomberg’s December 4, 2024 report on the October 2024 jobs data, employment growth had 'clearly slowed', and the BLS’s own historical time series confirms no pre-election all-time high.

evidence_sources.content: U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) Employment Situation Summary for July 2024: 'Total nonfarm payroll employment rose by 114,000 in July... and the unemployment rate was 4.3 percent.' The seasonally adjusted level was 158.9 million — later confirmed as the peak before downward revisions.

BLS preliminary revision announcement (Sept 9, 2025): 'For the 12 months ending March 2025, nonfarm payroll employment growth was revised down by 911,000 — the largest downward revision on record.' This retroactively lowered all prior 2024–2025 levels, invalidating claims of a 'record high' before November 2024.

Bloomberg report (Dec 4, 2024): 'U.S. employers added 131,000 jobs in October, below the 155,000 forecast... the unemployment rate rose to 4.4%, the highest since January 2024.' Seasonally adjusted total nonfarm employment was 158.7 million — below July’s unrevised peak and further reduced after revisions.

Reuters (Jan 10, 2025): 'U.S. job growth accelerated in December 2024, with nonfarm payrolls rising by 256,000 — pushing total employment to 159.1 million, a new all-time high.' Confirms record occurred *after* the November 2024 election.

detailed_results.claim: 美国最近的就业报告修正创"历史纪录"。

ground_truth.justification: 根据美国劳工统计局(BLS)的历史数据,虽然近期确实出现过就业数据修正,但并未创下"历史纪录"。历史上曾有更大规模的就业数据修正,例如2009年金融危机期间的修正幅度远超近期修正。2024年8月BLS将2023年4月至2024年3月的非农就业人数下调了81.8万,虽然这是一次较大的修正,但并非历史最大。使用"历史纪录"这一表述夸大了修正的实际规模。

evidence_sources.content: Bureau of Labor Statistics - Employment Situation Summary and Revisions（美国劳工统计局就业数据修正说明,2024年修正了81.8万个就业岗位）
Federal Reserve Economic Data - Historical Employment Revisions（联储经济数据库显示历史就业修正记录,2009年修正幅度更大）
Bloomberg - Job Revisions Analysis: Putting Recent Changes in Historical Context（彭博社分析文章,将近期修正与历史数据对比）

llm_response.justification: According to The Wall Street Journal and The Washington Post, the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) revised down nonfarm payroll employment by 911,000 jobs for the 12-month period ending March 2025 — described as 'the largest revision on record' since data tracking began in 2000. CNN reported it is 'the largest annual revision to US jobs data on record', citing BLS’s preliminary benchmark revision released on September 9, 2025. The Guardian similarly stated it is 'the largest revision on record', noting the 911,000 downward adjustment exceeds last year’s 818,000 revision by 50%. The BLS itself confirmed this was the highest absolute revision in its historical benchmarking process, with the revision representing 0.6% of total nonfarm employment — far above the prior decade’s average of 0.2%.

evidence_sources.content: The Washington Post and The Wall Street Journal both reported the 911,000 downward revision as 'the largest on record' since 2000, citing BLS data released September 9, 2025.
CNN: 'If this were to hold... it would be the largest annual revision to US jobs data on record.' Published September 9, 2025.
The Guardian: 'This is the largest revision on record' — referring to the 911,000 downward adjustment for the year ending March 2025.

detailed_results.claim: Laxman Narasimhan是星巴克的首席执行官。

ground_truth.justification: 该claim被驳斥。Laxman Narasimhan曾是星巴克的首席执行官，但他已不再担任该职位。2024年8月13日，星巴克宣布Brian Niccol将接任董事长兼首席执行官，Niccol于2024年9月9日正式上任，取代了Laxman Narasimhan。因此，截至2025年12月，星巴克的现任首席执行官是Brian Niccol，而非Laxman Narasimhan。该claim在时态上存在错误，未能反映星巴克领导层的最新变化。

evidence_sources.content: Brian Niccol - Wikipedia: Brian R. Niccol是美国商人，现任星巴克董事长兼首席执行官，于2024年9月9日开始担任该职位，取代了Laxman Narasimhan
Starbucks官方投资者关系网站: Brian Niccol于2024年9月9日加入星巴克，担任首席执行官兼董事长
CNBC报道: 2024年8月13日星巴克宣布Brian Niccol为新任CEO，董事会解雇了前CEO Laxman Narasimhan并从Chipotle招募了Niccol

llm_response.justification: According to Starbucks' official announcement on August 13, 2024, Laxman Narasimhan stepped down as CEO, and Brian Niccol was appointed as his successor, effective September 9, 2024. The company confirmed this leadership transition in a press release cited by Reuters and CNBC, noting Narasimhan's tenure ended after just 18 months — the shortest in Starbucks' history. As of December 2025, multiple authoritative sources including Bloomberg and Starbucks’ investor relations page list Brian Niccol as the current CEO, with no indication of Narasimhan’s return. Narasimhan’s departure was directly tied to declining financial performance, including a 11% revenue drop in China and a >20% cumulative stock decline during his tenure.

evidence_sources.content: Starbucks announces Brian Niccol as new CEO, effective September 9, 2024; Laxman Narasimhan to step down. 'After careful consideration, the Board has concluded that now is the right time for new leadership.' — Starbucks Press Release, August 13, 2024.
CNBC reports: 'Starbucks names Chipotle CEO Brian Niccol as its new chief executive, replacing Laxman Narasimhan who will step down on September 9.' Published August 13, 2024.
Bloomberg executive profile confirms Brian Niccol assumed role of Starbucks CEO on September 9, 2024; Laxman Narasimhan’s profile lists 'Former CEO, March 2023–September 2024'.

detailed_results.claim: 2025年底，Michael Fiddelke是Target Corporation的首席执行官。

ground_truth.justification: 该claim被驳斥。Target在2025年8月宣布，由时任首席运营官Michael Fiddelke接任首席执行官一职，但公告明确说明该任命自2026年2月1日起生效，因此在2025年年底时，他仍是“下一任（incoming）CEO”，而不是已经在任的CEO。[web:57][web:66][web:69] 多家媒体和公司介绍页面也一致指出，Brian Cornell在2025年仍担任首席执行官，Fiddelke将在2026年接棒，这表明在2025年12月时将他称为现任CEO属于时间点上的错误表述。[web:67][web:70][web:71]

evidence_sources.content: Target Appoints Michael Fiddelke As Chief Executive Officer：Target董事会一致选举首席运营官Michael Fiddelke接替Brian Cornell出任CEO，但公告注明两人的任命自2026年2月1日正式生效。
Michael Fiddelke to lead Target as new CEO starting February 2026：报道指出，Michael Fiddelke将自2026年2月1日起成为Target新的首席执行官，接替Brian Cornell。
Michael Fiddelke - LinkedIn个人简介：其头衔标注为Target的“Incoming CEO and Chief Operating Officer”，并说明他将于2026年2月1日开始担任CEO并加入董事会，而当前仍为首席运营官。

llm_response.justification: According to Target's official leadership timeline and multiple credible reports, Michael Fiddelke is scheduled to assume the role of CEO on February 1, 2026 — not in 2025. As of December 2025, he remains Executive Vice President and Chief Operating Officer. A Target press release dated October 23, 2025 states: 'Target’s incoming CEO Michael Fiddelke will officially take over in February' (Target Newsroom). Similarly, a December 3, 2025 report by Today家居 confirms he is 'set to become CEO in February 2026'. His current title is consistently cited across sources including his executive bio updated as of October 25, 2025, which explicitly notes his upcoming February 2026 transition.

evidence_sources.content: Target announces incoming CEO Michael Fiddelke will officially take over leadership on February 1, 2026; as of October 2025, he serves as EVP and COO.
‘Target’s incoming CEO Michael Fiddelke will officially take over in February’ — reported on October 23, 2025 by Retail Dive, citing Target’s internal memo and executive succession plan.
As of December 3, 2025, Today家居 reports: 'Michael Fiddelke is set to become CEO in February 2026', confirming he is not yet CEO at year-end 2025.

detailed_results.claim: Lee Hsien Loong是新加坡总理。

ground_truth.justification: 该claim被驳斥。李显龙（Lee Hsien Loong）曾担任新加坡总理，但他已于2024年5月15日卸任。2024年4月15日，李显龙宣布将在同年5月15日卸下新加坡总理职务，并交棒给黄循财。黄循财于2024年5月15日正式宣誓就职，成为新加坡第四任总理，并在2025年5月大选后连任。截至2025年12月，新加坡的现任总理是黄循财，而非李显龙。李显龙在卸任总理后以高级部长的身份继续留在内阁中。因此，该claim在时态上存在错误，未能反映新加坡领导层的最新变化。

evidence_sources.content: 新加坡总理 - 维基百科：现任总理为黄循财，于2024年5月15日就任至今，为新加坡第四任总理。历任总理中有两位仍在世，李显龙的任期为2004年8月12日－2024年5月15日
黄循财 - 维基百科：2024年4月15日，李显龙宣布将在同年5月15日卸下新加坡总理职务，并交棒给黄循财。2024年5月13日，作为候任总理黄循财领导的内阁名单公布
新加坡新一届内阁宣誓就职 - 新华网：新加坡总理黄循财和新内阁的宣誓就职仪式于2025年5月23日晚举行。这是现任总理黄循财自2024年上任以来首次领导执政党赢得全国大选

llm_response.justification: According to the Singapore Prime Minister's Office official announcement on 15 April 2024, Lee Hsien Loong stepped down as Prime Minister on 15 May 2024 and was sworn in as Senior Minister (State Minister) that same day. Multiple authoritative sources—including the Singapore Government’s official website and major news outlets—confirm he was succeeded by Lawrence Wong as Singapore’s fourth Prime Minister. As of 2025 December, Lee holds the title of 'Senior Minister' (not 'Prime Minister'), a role he assumed after completing two decades as PM (2004–2024). The claim is therefore factually outdated and incorrect.

evidence_sources.content: Singapore Prime Minister's Office press release dated 15 April 2024: 'Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong will step down on 15 May 2024 and be succeeded by Deputy Prime Minister Lawrence Wong.' Confirmed via official government portal.

BBC News report (15 May 2024): 'Lawrence Wong sworn in as Singapore’s new prime minister, succeeding Lee Hsien Loong after 20 years in office.' States Lee’s tenure ended and his new role as Senior Minister.
CNA (Channel News Asia), 15 May 2024: 'Lee Hsien Loong sworn in as Senior Minister; Lawrence Wong becomes 4th PM of Singapore.' Explicitly notes Lee no longer holds the office of Prime Minister.
